zero.description: These elements are typically persistent, fixed to the screen and are not draggable

xhalf.description: Subtle and very small components that do not contain complex information

x.description: Use this for smaller form components

x2.description: Secondary containers that house a moderate amount of information and form components

x4.description: Primary containers that house a large amount of other elements and complex information

x6.description: Full width sheets that are temporary and modal views
